title: Holidays Unpacked
overview: Brits spend about a grand each on a week's holiday in the summer sun. Most of us head to the Med, but could we all be having more fun for the same money? In this new series, Morland Sanders and Lucy Hedges road test up-and-coming travel destinations to discover the holidays you could have this summer. From zip-lining in Costa Rica to swimming with wild dolphins in the Azores, climbing ancient pyramids in Mexico or discovering Cambodia's tropical beaches, Holidays Unpacked takes viewers to on-trend destinations, on everyday budgets.
